comment.author: 43247421@N07
comment._content: These photographs were taken by Tasmanian commercial photographer Thomas J. Nevin, reproduced as single photographs from his original stereograph on salt paper, and included in many albums sold as "Tasmanian Views" accredited to his partner in the 1860s-80s, Samuel Clifford who took the Government House photos in this set. See: tasmanianphotographer.blogspot.com.au/2009/01/thomas-nevi...
